attributes.action: Stop implementing Brock and deliver a genuine solution to the problem
attributes.additional_details: Finding a permanent solution to operation Brock and keeping Kent’s roads open will be hugely beneficial to the south east. When implemented it effects every town on the M20 from Dover and as far as Maidstone and beyond. There is little to no hygiene stations for  lorry drivers going to the toilet or wash whilst the drivers are stuck on the motorway. The congestion around town causes disruption to local residents and businesses alike.
attributes.background: Operation Brock needs to be stop being implemented and a long term solution to the problem found.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what you mean by 'genuine solution'. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You'll need to use a full name if you do start a new petition.
